data.message: Only a white person would just like eminem because he's a good rapper and he's white I like eminem because he's a good rapper not because he's white even know I don't listen to him as much but I watch 8 mile every now and then 😂💯

replies.message: I'm white,but I don't like him because of his color. I don't understand why people judge dudes by their skin,I mean,this doesn't matter at all😂😂
But some white people do  only like him cuz he's white if they think all the other rappers suck 😂
I didn't like him because of his skins color. I also like 50 cent.

If don't matter if your black or white, if you a good rapper your a good rapper. I'm a white boy from England and I think Em is one of the best not because of colour but because of his talent. 2pac will always be the king of rap. 👍👍👍
Well I ain't in to paul wall or bubba or Macklemore and they're white, eminem is just special everyone knows that, living legend

I don't like him because he's white! That's ridiculous I like him because he's the most talented rapper just so happens he's white! Most Rappers now suck! They have no talent seriously rap about something other then your money , watches, or hoes because in a few years most of them will be washed up Eminem still going strong 20 plus years!
👆Check out Kendrick Lamar or J Cole
David Mills I hate most rap but Eminem is actually original he is awesome color nothing to do with it
Eminem is the only white rapper actually truly accepted and paid respect to back in the days, by all the afro-american big rappers
I have never heard anybody say they only like em because he is white, wtf

David Mills, you are (and i'm kinda sure) the only one saying anything about colour preferences in these comments.. and white people are rasist?! Da fuck man?! Skin colour doesn't matter! Nor does religion...but that is another story :)
Hey david check out watch me whip watch me nae nae.... Lyrical genius
why, just coz they're black
Why is everybody getting butt hurt it must obviously be true what I said can't handle the truth huh cuz I don't see one black person commenting 😂

I'm sure if u would've said no black ppl like eminem or something to that effect then u would get them commenting but u called out white ppl in a comment on the Internet.  Wtf did u expect? I have lost all hope for rap considering it's nothing but dance music or worse someone trying to brag about what they have or where they come from and how it's so gangster. When the truth is they went to a private school. This guys a gangsta? His real names Clarence.and Clarence lives at home with both parents.  And Clarence parents have a real good marriage.  Point made is that eminem speaks from the heart and leaves it all out there. Especially on stage . U can feel that's he's been thru what he raps about. I don't feel a slight rush when I listen to today's rap. The best I've heard lately is dre on talking to my diary. He actually spit some shit that was heartfelt and true to himself or when he talked about teachers not getting paid enough. It's simple real recognize real and em is definitely the most real out there. As far as living what he raps yes indeed sir that's him. So go ahead and jump on a feed that praises eminem and make it all about race because that's what America has turned into. If u have no other argument bring up race or bigotry. Real classy dude. U are what is wrong with America today. And certainly why we as a nation will be falling before 2026. So I hope u enjoy the racism that Obama fed u thru the news and used to divide our country. Thanks alot for ur useless comment and ur obvious racism towards the white man. So tired of being labeled racist or white loving because I'm white . So go to hell a build a snowman gurrrrrrrrrrrrrrl

For your information I like eminem myself most of his fans are white though I can tell and besides I don't even bump eminem cuz I don't get into his music as much rappers like T.I Rick Ross big Sean game Jeezy Ludacris project pat juice j yo Gotti Gucci mane I can get into and it's not because their black it's because I feel their music more 💯

People in the rap game, dre, jay, game, snoop, tech nine , kalifa , dmx, kendrick , t.i..... Etc etc all believe em is one of the greatest of all time, but let's have David's opinion please, yeah white people are into him, but so do black people , but cheers for your opinion benzino
